title: Andrea del Sarto - it's "safer" to be "underrated"

content.prompt: The speaker probably believes that it is “safer” (line 39) for him to be “something underrated here” (line 40) because thus he

choices.label: is less likely to inspire jealousy in others
can strive for improvement during his lifetime
will be less prone to egotism and self-love

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe what specific textual details reveal about a character, that character's perspective, and that character's motives.
